metadata.title: The Missing Merchant
metadata.description: A mysterious disappearance in a peaceful village leads to dark secrets in this classic fantasy RPG adventure.
metadata.author: Bytebound Chronicles Team

beats.title: Arrival at Millhaven
beats.description: You arrive at the small village of Millhaven as storm clouds gather overhead.

narrativeGuidance.openingText: You stand at the edge of Millhaven, a quaint village nestled in the shadows of whispering woods. The evening air is heavy with the promise of rain, and the villagers seem to hurry past with downcast eyes.

dynamicElements.highTrust: Some villagers nod in acknowledgment as you pass.
dynamicElements.lowTrust: Villagers quickly shut their doors and windows at your approach.
dynamicElements.lowHealth: You lean against a fence post, trying to hide your obvious injuries.

quickActions.label: Enter the village peacefully
quickActions.description: Walk in with a non-threatening demeanor

quickActions.label: Carefully observe your surroundings
quickActions.description: Take time to study the village before entering

quickActions.label: Approach the elderly man by the gate
Examine the wagon tracks
quickActions.description: Investigate the strange marks on the ground

encounters.description: A mangy dog blocks your path, growling suspiciously

quickActions.label: Offer food to calm the dog

skillChecks.successText: You notice fresh wagon tracks leading away from the main road, and something dark staining the cobblestones.
skillChecks.failureText: The gathering darkness makes it hard to see details clearly.

criticalSuccess.text: Your keen eyes spot not just wagon tracks, but bloodstains and signs of a struggle. Someone was dragged from this spot.

beats.title: The Tarnished Tankard
beats.description: The village tavern holds secrets and potential allies.

narrativeGuidance.openingText: The tavern's warmth is a welcome relief from the growing storm outside. A red-haired woman tends the bar while a few locals nurse their drinks in shadowy corners.

dynamicElements.highTrust: The patrons seem accepting of your presence, some even nodding in greeting.
dynamicElements.lowTrust: Conversations stop as you enter, and suspicious eyes follow your every move.

quickActions.label: Order a drink to blend in
quickActions.description: Try to gain trust by acting like a regular patron

quickActions.label: Search Garrett's usual table
quickActions.description: Look for clues where he last sat

hiddenTriggers.description: Rhea trusts you enough to share important information
hiddenTriggers.narrative: Rhea leans in conspiratorially and begins to share what she really knows.

beats.title: Into the Darkwood
beats.description: The cursed forest holds the key to the mystery.

narrativeGuidance.openingText: The forest looms before you, darker than the night itself. An unnatural silence hangs in the air, broken only by the distant sound of something large moving through the underbrush.
moodProgression: Tension builds as you enter the woods
Strange sounds echo from the depths

encounters.description: The Watcher emerges from the shadows - a twisted creature with three glowing eyes

characters.name: Elder Thomsen
characters.description: A weathered man with knowing eyes and secrets behind his careful words

initial_meeting.text: Storm's coming, stranger. And not just the kind that soaks your boots. If you're here about Garrett, you're walking into something dark.

garrett_info.text: Garrett was... troubled. Asked too many questions about things better left alone. Last seen at the Tankard three nights past. Never made it to the crossroads.

characters.name: Rhea
characters.description: The tavern keeper with sharp eyes and hidden courage

companionAbilities.name: Herbal Healing
companionAbilities.description: Rhea can brew healing potions from forest herbs

companionAbilities.name: Village Insider
companionAbilities.description: Provides hints and reveals hidden paths

items.name: Garrett's Ledger
items.description: A leather-bound journal filled with trade records and increasingly frantic notes

items.name: Vial of Sporebane
items.description: A glowing green liquid that Rhea insists you'll need in the forest

items.name: Millhaven Blade
items.description: A well-maintained sword with silver inlay, blessed by the village priest

items.name: Bloodstained Cloth
items.description: A piece of fabric with dark stains, clearly from a struggle

endings.title: The Village Hero
endings.description: You save the village and become a local legend
endings.narrative: The village of Millhaven celebrates your victory. The Watcher's defeat has lifted a curse that plagued the region for generations. Elder Thomsen reveals the true history, and Rhea's tavern becomes a shrine to your heroics. You are forever welcome here.

consequences.playerLegacy: Remembered as the Hero of Millhaven

endings.title: The Price of Truth
endings.description: You uncover the truth but at great personal cost
endings.narrative: The Watcher falls, but your injuries are severe. You've saved the village, but the cost was almost too high. As you recover, you realize some mysteries are better left buried.

consequences.playerLegacy: A hero who paid the ultimate price

endings.title: In Service of Shadows
endings.description: You make a deal with forces beyond understanding
endings.narrative: Fear overcomes you in the final moment. You accept the Watcher's offer of power in exchange for service. The village is spared, but at the cost of your humanity.

consequences.worldState: Village safe but under dark protection
consequences.playerLegacy: Becomes the new guardian of dark secrets

toneProgression.act1: mysterious and foreboding, building tension through investigation
toneProgression.act2: darker and more urgent, supernatural elements emerging
toneProgression.climax: intense confrontation with forces beyond mortal understanding

aiGuidance.playerAgency: Always allow creative solutions beyond the quick actions. Reward clever thinking and problem-solving. Players should feel their choices matter.
aiGuidance.mechanicsHandling: Never mention numbers or stats to the player. Describe effects narratively - 'you feel more confident' instead of '+10 courage'.

responseToPlayerMood.aggressive: NPCs become defensive or hostile, some respect shown for directness
responseToPlayerMood.cautious: NPCs appreciate careful approach, more secrets revealed
responseToPlayerMood.friendly: Opens up social options, characters more willing to help
responseToPlayerMood.reckless: Consequences are swift and sometimes severe

forbiddenTopics: Graphic violence beyond fantasy adventure levels

parameters.trust: number (-100 to 100) - how villagers perceive player
parameters.courage: number (-100 to 100) - bravery in dangerous situations
parameters.knowledge: number (0 to 10) - clues and information gathered

parameters.itemId: string - ID of item to add
string - ID of item to remove

functionCalls.description: Move to next story beat or unlock new content

parameters.beatId: string - ID of beat to transition to

functionCalls.name: unlockQuickAction
functionCalls.description: Make a hidden quick action visible to player

parameters.actionId: string - ID of action to reveal

restrictions: Don't use for obvious checks the player should know
